headline: Does UK Space Agency Deal Signal a New Era for RTX's (RTX) Space Defense Ambitions?
summary: The UK Space Agency recently awarded a contract to Raytheon UK, part of RTX, to provide orbital analysts and NORSSTrack software in support of the country's Space Domain Awareness mission, with analysts based at the National Space Operations Centre at RAF High Wycombe. This collaboration underscores RTX's growing influence in both space operations and national security technology, reinforcing its global defense presence beyond traditional markets. We’ll now explore how the UK Space Agency...
